gurmukhi: dRumj Sbd ko Awid su dIjY ]nwidk pd ko bhur BnIjY ]piRsTx Sbd su AMq bKwnhu ]SB hI nwm qupk ky mwnhu ]709]
transliteration: Droumaj Shabad Ko Aadh Su Deejai|| Naaik Pad Ko Bahur Bhaneejai|| Pristhan Shabad Su Ant Bakhaanoh|| Sabh Hinaam Toupak Ke Maanoh||709||
translation: Putting the word “Drumaj” in the beginning, then adding the word “Naayak” and then adding the word “Prashthani” at the end, all the names of Tupak are comprehended.709.

gurmukhi: Pl pd Awid aucwrn kIjY ]qw pwCY nwiek pd dIjY ]puin piRstx qum Sbd aucwro ]nwm qupk ky skl ibcwro ]710]
transliteration: Phal Pad Aadh Ouchaaran Keejai|| Taa Paachhai Naaik Pad Deejai|| Poun(i) Pristhan Toum Shabad Oucdaro|| Naam Toupak Ke Sakal Bicdaro||710||
translation: Uttering firstly the word “Phal”, then the word “Naayak” and then saying the word “Prashthani”, all the names of Tupak are comprehended.710.

gurmukhi: qrj Sbd ko Awid aucrIAY ]rwj Sbd ko bhur suDrIAY ]qw pwCy piRsTx pd dIjY ]nwm quPMg jwn jIA lIjY ]711]
transliteration: Taraj Shabad Ko Aadh Udareeai|| Raaj Shabad Ko Bahur Sudareeai|| Taa Paachhe Pristhan Pad Deejai|| Naam Touphan Jaan Jeea Leejai||711||
translation: Saying the word “Taruj” in the beginning and then adding the words “Raaj” and “Prashthani”, the names of Tupak (Tuphang) are known in the mind.711.

gurmukhi: DrnIjw pd Awid Bin`jY ]rwt Sbd qw pwCY id`jY ]piRsTx pd ko AMq bKwno ]nwm qupk sB Bydn mwno ]712]
transliteration: Dharnee-jaa Pad Aadh Bhanijjai Raaj Shabad Taa Paachhai Dijjai|| Pristhan Pad Ko Ant Bakhaano|| Naam Toupak Sabh Bhedan Naamo||712||
translation: Saying the words “Dharni Jaa”, then adding the word “Raat” and afterwards adding the words “Prashthani” , comprehend all the names of Tupak.712.

gurmukhi: biRCj Sbd ko Awid BnIjY ]qw pwCy rwjw pd dIjY ]piRsTx Sbd su AMq aucwro ]nwm qupk ky skl ibcwro ]713]
transliteration: Brichhaj Shabad Ko Aadh Bhaneejai|| Taa Paachhe Raajaa Pad Deejai|| Pristhan Shabad Su Ant Oucdaro|| Naam Toupak Ke Sakal Bicdaro||713||
translation: Saying the word “Vrakshaj” in the beginning and then adding the words “Raajaa” and “Prashthani”, comprehend all the names of Tupak.713.

gurmukhi: qru ruh Anuj Awid pd dIjY ]nwiek pd ko bhur BnIjYm ]piRsTx Sbd AMq ky dIny ]nwm qupk ky hoih nvIny ]714]
transliteration: Tar(u) Ruh Anuj Aadh Pad Dijai|| Naaik Pad Ko Bahur Bhaneejai|| Pristhan Shabad Ant Ke Deene|| Naam Toupak Ke Hohe Naveene||714||
translation: Saying the words “Taru-ruha-anuj” in the beginning and then adding the words “Naayak” and “Prashthani”, new names of Tupak are evolved.714.

gurmukhi: qru ruh piRsTx piRQm hI muK qy krO aucwr ]nwm qupk ky hoq hYN cIn cqur inrDwr ]
transliteration: Tar(u) Roub Pristhan Pritham Himoukh Te Karau Ouchaar|| Naam Toupak Ke Hot Hain Cheen Chatur Nirdhaar||715||
translation: Saying the words “Taru-ruha-prashthani”, O wise men ! the names of Tupak may be comprehended.715.

gurmukhi: su kib bkqR qy kuMdxI piRQmY kro aucwr ]nwm qupk ky hoq hYN lIjhu sumiq svwr ]716]
transliteration: Su Kabi Baktra Te Koundaniprithmai Daro Ouchaar|| Naam Toupak Ke Hot Hain Leejoh Soumat(i) Savaar||716||
translation: O good poet, utter the word “Kundani” from your mouth, from which the names of Tupak are formed correctly.716.

gurmukhi: kwSt kuMdnI Awid aucwrn kIjIAY ]nwm qupk ky cIn cqur icq lIjIAY ]
transliteration: Kaadhat Koundaniaadh Ouchaaran Keejiai|| Naam Toupak Ke Cheen Chatur Chit Leejeeai||
translation: The names of Tupak are recognized by uttering the words “Kaashth-Kundani”

gurmukhi: biRCj bwsnI Sbd bkqR qy BwKIAY ]ho nwm qupk ky jwin hiRdY mY rwKIAY ]717]
transliteration: Brichhaj Baasanishabad Baktra Te Bhaakheeai|| Ho Naam Toupak Ke Jaan(i) Hridai Mai Raakheeai||717||
translation: Saying the words “Vraksh-jawaasini” from the mouth, the names of Tupak are know in the heart.717.

gurmukhi: Dreysrjw Sbd su AMq bKwnIAY ]qw pwCy kuMdnI bhur pd TwnIAY ]
transliteration: Dhar-esarjaa Shabad Su Ant Bakhaaneeai|| Taa Paachhe Koundanibahur Pad Thaaneeai||
translation: Saying the words “Dhar-Ishwarjaa” and then adding the word “Kundani” after it,

gurmukhi: su kib sBY icq mwJ su swc ibcwrIXo ]ho nwm qupk ky skl inSMk aucwrIXo ]718]
transliteration: Su Kabi Sabhai Chit Maajh Su Saach Bichdareeyo|| Ho Naam Toupak Ke Sakal Nishank Ouchdareeyo||718||
translation: O good poets ! comprehend it ad true and utter the names of Tupak unhesitatingly.718.
